subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With 22 seconds remaining, Trey Burke stole the ball from No. 9 Michigan State near midcourt and dunked it to give No. 4 Michigan the victory.
snippet: With 22 seconds remaining, Trey Burke stole the ball from No. 9 Michigan State near midcourt and dunked it to give No. 4 Michigan the victory.
